## Blackbox commands extracted/expanded from blackbox_tests.csv
## Each non-comment line is a taskmgr command. Lines starting with # are ignored by taskmgr.

# BB-01 Help shows commands
help

# BB-02 Print empty list
print

# BB-03 Add minimal task
add name="Task A"

# BB-04 Add full task
add name="T" type="Work" desc="d" due="31-10-2025" rep="DAILY" prio="HIGH"

# BB-05 Add missing name (expected error)
add type="x"

# BB-06 Add too many args (expected error)
add name="A" extra="x"

# BB-07 Invalid date format (expected error)
add name="A" due="2025-10-31"

# BB-08 Invalid repeat value (expected error)
add name="A" rep="YEARLY"

# BB-09 Invalid priority value (expected error)
add name="A" prio="URGENT"

# BB-10 Print sorts by due asc
print sort_by=due direction=asc

# BB-11 Print invalid direction (expected error)
print sort_by=name direction=up

# BB-12 Print invalid property (expected error)
print sort_by=unknown

# BB-13 List by type case-insensitive
list property="type" val="school"

# BB-14 List missing args (expected error)
list property="type"

# BB-15 List too many args / malformed val (expected error)
list property="type" val="School extra=1"

# BB-16 Modify field success (assumes id=0 exists from earlier add)
mod id=0 property="desc" new_val="Updated"

# BB-17 Modify missing args (expected error)
mod id=0 property="desc"

# BB-18 Modify invalid id (expected error)
mod id=100 property="desc" new_val="x"

# BB-19 Modify invalid property (expected error)
mod id=0 property="unknown" new_val="x"

# BB-20 Modify due invalid format (expected error)
mod id=0 property="due" new_val="2025/10/31"

# BB-21 Done success
done id=0

# BB-22 Done missing arg (expected error)
done

# BB-23 Done invalid id (expected error)
done id=999

# BB-24 Id increments - add three tasks sequentially
add name="Seq1"
add name="Seq2"
add name="Seq3"

# BB-25 Ctime present format (just add one)
add name="A"

# BB-26 Line length limit (exceed) - a single line >1024 chars


# BB-27 Unknown command error (expected error)
foobar arg=1

# BB-28 Non-string name without quotes (expected error)
add name=12345

# BB-29 Print default sort name asc
print

# BB-30 List sort desc
list property="prio" val="MEDIUM" sort_by=name direction=desc
